name: standard-notes
description: Standard Notes is an end-to-end encrypted note-taking app with cross-platform clients and extensible editors. It can sync via official cloud or self-hosted servers for full data ownership.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Encrypts all notes client-side before syncing to server

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Syncs notes across desktop, mobile, and web applications

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Extends with editors for Markdown, code, spreadsheets, and more

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organizes notes with nested tags and smart filters

features.title: Version History
features.description: Accesses previous versions of notes for recovery and comparison

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Works fully offline with automatic sync when connection returns

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Customizes appearance with various themes and color schemes

features.title: Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: Secures account with 2FA for additional protection
